pages.text: The occult has shown to be able to fulfill dreams of many! And with that comes the ability to cast spells.$(br)In order to cast a spell, one must create a $(l:shaping/entry_thaumagral)Thaumagral$(). Using this Thaumagral will cast the currently selected spell.

The selected spells can be cycled by pressing the $(l)$(k:elementaristics_down)$() or $(l)$(k:elementaristics_up)$() key. $(br)Casting a spell will always set a cooldown on the Thaumagral, as well as drain and stunt the amount of Magan the caster has.
